subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Dany Heatley had a goal and two assists and Jason Spezza had three assists last night in the Ottawa Senators’ 4-2 win against the Canadiens in Montreal.
snippet: Dany Heatley had a goal and two assists and Jason Spezza had three assists last night in the Ottawa Senators’ 4-2 win against the Canadiens in Montreal.
